scripts.compile: npm run compile-es && npm run compile-js
scripts.clean: npm run clean-es && npm run clean-js
scripts.compile-test: npm run conv-test && browserify -d test/index.ts -p [ tsify --resolveJsonModule ] -o test-out.js
scripts.test-node: npm run conv-test && TS_NODE_TYPE_CHECK=y TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"resolveJsonModule":true}' mocha -r ts-node/register test/index.ts
scripts.conv-test: ts-node test/to test/original test/original-out.json; ts-node test/to test/new test/new-out.json
